sentences.text: PART II - COMPENSATION DISCUSSION & ANALYSIS MASCO 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2: Advisory Vote to Approve the Compensation of Our Named Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are seeking your advisory vote approving the compensation paid to our named executive officers (whom we refer to as executive officers in this Proposal 2).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the structure of our executive compensation programs promotes the long-term interests of our stockholders by attracting and retaining talented executives and motivating them to achieve our critical business objectives and to create long-term value for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2016 Annual Meeting, we submitted a non-binding advisory proposal to our stockholders to approve the compensation paid to our executive officers (a say-on-pay proposal).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approximately 98% of the votes cast on our say-on-pay proposal approved the compensation paid to our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this strong approval resulted from our continued focus on pay-for-performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We delivered strong financial results in 2016, and in doing so, we exceeded the target goals for our performance-based compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 annual performance program was based on operating profit and working capital as a percent of sales goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved a performance percentage of 141%, and as a result, consistent with our commitment to pay-for-performance, our executive officers earned restricted stock awards and cash bonuses based on this achievement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2014-2016 Long Term Cash Incentive Program was based on return on invested capital.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the three-year period 2014-2016, we exceeded the target ROIC goal and achieved a performance percentage of 132%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers potential performance-based compensation represents a significant percentage of total annual target compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the percentage of total target compensation (base salary, target annual cash bonus and restricted stock award and the target value of long-term incentives) that was performance-based was 86% for our CEO and 73% for our other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that having a significant ownership interest in our stock is critical to aligning the interests of our executive officers with the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, equity grants in the form of restricted stock awards and stock options are an important component of compensation for our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recommends a vote FOR the following resolution providing an advisory approval of the compensation paid to our named executive officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the compensation paid to the Companys named executive officers, as disclosed pursuant to the compensation disclosure rules of the SEC, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the compensation tables and the related materials disclosed in this proxy statement, is hereby approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the vote on this proposal is advisory and non-binding, our Compensation Committee and our Board will review and consider the result of the vote when making future determinations regarding our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast by shares entitled to vote thereon is required for the approval of the foregoing resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast, and therefore do not affect the approval of the resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Depending on the results of Proposal 3, we will hold the next advisory vote on compensation of our named executive officers in 2018, 2019 or 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MASCO 2017 PART II - COMPENSATION DISCUSSION & ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3: Advisory Vote on Frequency of Advisory Votes on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are also seeking your input with respect to the frequency of future stockholder advisory votes on compensation paid to our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, we are asking whether the advisory vote that is the subject of Proposal 2 should occur every 1, 2 or 3 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes at this time that an annual advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers is appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An annual advisory vote will allow us to continue to obtain information on stockholders views of the compensation of our named executive officers on a current and consistent basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe that an annual advisory vote will provide our Compensation Committee and our Board with more direct input from stockholders on our executive compensation policies, practices and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When voting on this Proposal you will have the option to choose whether to approve holding future advisory votes on the compensation of our named executive officers every 1, 2 or 3 years, or to abstain entirely from voting on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a frequency (1, 2 or 3 years) receives a majority of the votes cast by shares entitled to vote thereon, it will be deemed to be the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers recommended by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast, and therefore do not affect the selection of frequency on the outcome.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote on this proposal is advisory and is not binding; however, our Board will carefully consider the voting results when deciding when to call for the next advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the reasons discussed above, our Board recommends a vote for the selection of 1 YEAR as the frequency with which stockholders will vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will hold the next advisory vote on the frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation of our named executive officers in 2023.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RETIREMENT PLANS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This section describes the retirement plans available to our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Defined Contribution Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our defined contribution plans are the tax-qualified 401(k) Savings Plan and the non-qualified Benefits Restoration Plan (BRP) applicable to the 401(k) Savings Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our executive officers participate in both of our defined contribution plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We offer no other plans of deferred compensation that would permit the election of deferrals of cash compensation by our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 401(k) Savings Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 401(k) Savings Plan is available to eligible employees, and provides two employer contribution components, if applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The first employer contribution component is a matching contribution under which we match a percentage of an employees compensation deferred into the 401(k) Savings Plan.

sentences.text: The second component is a discretionary profit sharing contribution that is guided by the operating profit performance target goal used to determine annual performance-based restricted stock awards and cash bonuses (see Our 2016 Annual Performance Program above).

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee has established our maximum contribution percentage at 10% of each participants annual earnings (base salary and cash bonus).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following a participants termination of employment, the BRP account is paid by us in a lump sum.

sentences.text: Defined Benefit Pension Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our defined benefit pension plans are the tax-qualified Masco Corporation Pension Plan (the Pension Plan), the non-qualified BRP applicable to the Pension Plan and the non-qualified Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (SERP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our defined benefit pension plans were frozen for future benefit accruals effective January 1, 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consequently, the defined benefit pension benefits accrued for each of our executive officers are essentially fixed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Pension Plan and BRP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Pension Plan and BRP provide that at age 65, a participant receives an annual payment for the remainder of his or her life, with five years payments guaranteed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees became 100% vested in their pension benefit after completing five years of employment with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The benefits paid are reduced for early retirement if commenced prior to age 65.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum credited service under the Pension Plan and the defined benefit portion of the BRP was 30 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A participant who has ten or more years of service with us is eligible to receive a disability benefit equal to the participants accrued benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Allman, Sznewajs, OReagan and Cole are participants in our Pension Plan, and each is 100% vested in their Pension Plan benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Allman and Sznewajs are participants in our BRP applicable to the Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SERP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Sznewajs is a participant in the SERP, which provides that at age 65, participants receive an annual payment for life of an amount up to 60% of the average of their highest three years cash compensation (base salary plus annual cash bonus, up to 60% of that years maximum bonus opportunity) earned on or before January 1, 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SERP payments are reduced by certain benefits paid by our other retirement plans or by retirement benefits payable by other employers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum benefit under the SERP accrues after 15 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the SERP was frozen on January 1, 2010, Mr. Sznewajss accrual of 52% was frozen, and he is now 50% vested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Sznewajs will not be fully vested in his frozen SERP benefit unless he continues to be employed with us until he reaches age 55, or we have a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SERP provides a disability benefit for participants who become disabled while employed by us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The disability benefit is paid until the earlier of death, recovery from disability or age 65; is offset by payments from long-term disability insurance we have paid for; and is equal to 60% of the participants annual salary and bonus (up to 60% of the maximum bonus opportunity) as of January 1, 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At age 65, payments revert to a calculation based on the highest three-year average compensation as of January 1, 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the SERP, participants and their spouses may also receive medical benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have employment agreements or change in control agreements with any of our executive officers.

sentences.text: MASCO 2017 PART IV - AUDIT MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee assists the Board of Directors in fulfilling the Boards responsibility for oversight of the integrity of our financial statements, the effectiveness of our internal controls over financial reporting, the qualifications, independence, performance and compensation of our independent registered public accounting firm (independent auditors), the performance of our internal audit function, our compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, and compliance by our employees and officers with our Code of Business Ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the accuracy of our financial statements and our reporting process, including our system of internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In discharging its oversight responsibilities, the Audit Committee reviewed and discussed with management our audited financial statements as of and for the year ended December 31, 2016 and our processes to ensure the accuracy of our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee obtained from our independent auditors, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), the written disclosures and letter required by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board regarding PwCs communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with PwC any relationships that may impact PwCs objectivity and independence and satisfied itself as to PwCs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee confirmed that PwCs provision of non-audit services to us did not impair their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with PwC the matters required to be discussed by the Statement on Auditing Standards No. 1301 as adopted by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board, regarding communication with the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also met with PwC independent of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the reviews and discussions with management and the independent auditors described above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that our financial statements as of and for the year ended December 31, 2016 be included in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also reappointed PwC as our independent registered public accounting firm, which stockholders are being asked to ratify.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 4: Ratification of Selection of Independent Auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee is responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the independent external audit firm retained to audit our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its oversight, our Audit Committee and its Chairperson review and evaluate our lead audit engagement partner, and participate in the selection of the new lead audit engagement partner in conjunction with the mandated rotation of that partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee has selected the independent registered public accounting firm of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) to audit our financial statements for the year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained PwC (or its predecessor) as our independent auditor for over 50 years, and our Audit Committee believes that the continued retention of PwC to serve as our independent auditor is in the best interests of our Company and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of PwC will be present at our Annual Meeting and will have the opportunity to make a statement and respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the selection of PwC is not ratified, our Audit Committee will consider selecting another independent registered public accounting firm as our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast by shares entitled to vote is required for the ratification of the selection of independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast, and therefore do not affect the ratification of the selection of independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends a vote FOR the ratification of the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent auditors for the year 2017.

sentences.text: He served as Vice President, Enterprise Strategy & Development for UTC Aerospace Systems from 2013 through 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He previously served as Corporate Director, Corporate Strategy and Development for United Technologies Corporation (2012 - 2013) and as the Vice President, Business Development & Strategy for UTC Fire & Security (2011).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kenneth G. Cole: Mr. Cole was elected as our Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary in July 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cole joined us in 2004 and has held positions of increasing responsibility in our legal department, serving most recently as Senior Assistant General Counsel and Director of Commercial Legal Affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Christopher K. Kastner: Mr. Kastner joined us in December 2014 as Vice President, Masco Operating System.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined Danaher Corporation in 1995, where he worked for various business units, most recently as President (General Manager) of Anderson Instruments Co. (2013 - 2014) and as Vice President Global Operations - Gilbarco Veeder-Root (2008 - 2014).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kastner also served as Gilbarco Veeder-Roots Vice President Commercial (2012 - 2013) and Vice President Global Dispensing (2011 - 2012).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John P. Lindow: Mr. Lindow was elected as our Vice President, Controller and Chief Accounting Officer in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was a Masco Group Controller from 2000 to 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He then served as Vice President Administration - Plumbing Products Platform until 2009, and was elected as our Vice President, Controller in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard A. OReagan: Mr. OReagan was promoted to Group President, Global Plumbing in May 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined Masco in 2008 as Vice President of Sales for Delta Faucet Company and in 2011 became the President of Delta Faucet Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Renee Straber: Ms. Straber was elected Vice President, Chief Human Resource Officer in October 2014, after serving as our Group Director - Human Resources since 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She joined Masco in 1995 as a Human Resource Representative for Delta Faucet Company and was promoted to Vice President, Human Resources for Delta Faucet Company in 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John G. Sznewajs: Mr. Sznewajs was elected as our Vice President, Chief Financial Officer in 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SECTION 16(a) BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP REPORTING COMPLIANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 requires our executive officers and directors, and persons who own more than ten percent of our common stock, to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: file reports of their ownership of our common stock and changes in their ownership with the SEC and the New York Stock Exchange; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: furnish us with copies of these reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based solely on our review of copies of the reports we received, or written representations from our executive officers and directors that they were not required to file Form 5 ownership reports, we believe that each person who was a director, officer or beneficial owner of more than ten percent of our common stock at any time during 2016 timely met all applicable filing requirements during the year, except that in connection with four trades made by Mr. John Plant in 2015 and 2016, four Form 4 reports were filed late.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These trades were reported in one Form 4 report filed on May 2, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MASCO 2017 PART VI  GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of Masco Corporation is soliciting the enclosed proxy for use at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Masco Corporation to be held at our corporate office at 21001 Van Born Road, Taylor, Michigan 48180, on Friday, May 12, 2017 at 9:30 A.M.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time, and at any adjournment or postponement of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and the enclosed proxy card are being mailed or otherwise made available to stockholders on or about March 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are concurrently mailing to stockholders a copy of our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, which includes our Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board established the close of business on March 17, 2017 as the record date to determine the stockholders entitled to receive a notice of, and to vote at, our Annual Meeting or an adjournment or postponement of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, there were 319,946,383 shares of our common stock, $1 par value, outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of our common stock represents one vote that may be voted on each matter that may come before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares of our common stock represented by properly executed and unrevoked proxies will be voted by the persons named as proxy holders in accordance with the instructions given.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no instructions are indicated on a proxy, properly executed proxies will be voted as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR each Class II Director nominee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of the compensation paid to our named executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The selection of 1 YEAR as the frequency with which stockholders will vote on executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent auditors for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as a record holder and as a beneficial owner?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name with our registrar and transfer agent, Computershare, you are the record holder of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a record holder, we have provided these proxy materials directly to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a stock brokerage account, or with a bank or other holder of record, you are considered the beneficial owner of those shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name, these proxy materials have been forwarded to you by your bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner, you have the right to instruct that organization on how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name through a bank, broker or other nominee, you must provide voting instructions to that organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide voting instructions, the organization may vote in its discretion on routine proposals, but not on non-routine proposals, which is called a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only Proposal 4, Ratification of Selection of Independent Auditors, is a routine proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are abstentions and broker non-votes treated?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not treated as votes cast with respect to any of the proposals on the agenda, so they will not have an effect on the outcome of the proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PART VI  GENERAL INFORMATION MASCO 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To conduct business at our Annual Meeting, we must have a quorum of stockholders present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum is present when a majority of the outstanding shares of stock entitled to vote, as of the record date, are represented in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes and abstentions will be counted toward the establishment of the quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I submit my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are four methods you can use to vote: by internet, by telephone, by mail or in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting your proxy by internet, telephone or mail will not affect your right to attend the Annual Meeting and change your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you are voting in person, your vote must be received by 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on May 11, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Method Record Holder Beneficial Owner Internet Have your proxy card available and log on to www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your bank or broker makes this method available, the instructions will be included with the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone Have your proxy card available and call (800) 690-6903 from a touchtone telephone anywhere (toll free only in the United States).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your bank or broker makes this method available, the instructions will be included with the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail Your Proxy Card Mark, date, sign and promptly mail the enclosed proxy card in the postage-paid envelope provided for mailing in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark, date, sign and promptly mail the voting instruction form provided by your bank or broker in the postage-paid envelope provided for mailing in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person You may vote by ballot in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Obtain proof of stock ownership as of the record date and a valid legal proxy from the organization that holds your shares and attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are needed for each proposal to pass?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the matters to be considered at our Annual Meeting require the approval of a majority of the votes that are actually cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide that, in uncontested elections, directors are elected if the majority of votes cast FOR each nominee exceed the votes cast AGAINST such nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies cannot be voted for a greater number of persons than the number of nominees named.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director nominee will provide to us an irrevocable resignation if the majority of the votes cast are against him or her.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The resignation will be effective within 90 days after the election results are certified, if the Board (excluding nominees who did not receive a majority of votes for their election) accepts the resignation, which it will do in the absence of a compelling reason otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the stockholder of record, and you sign and return a proxy card without giving specific voting instructions, then the proxy holders will vote your shares in the manner recommended by our Board on all matters presented in this proxy statement, and as the proxy holders may determine in their discretion with respect to any other matters properly presented for a vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is my proxy revocable?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy before it is exercised by voting in person at the Annual Meeting, by timely delivering a subsequent proxy or by notifying us in writing of such revocation to the attention of Kenneth G. Cole, Secretary, at 21001 Van Born Road, Taylor, MI 48180 before your proxy is voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you revoke your proxy in person at the meeting, your revocation must be received by 11:59 P.M.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on May 11, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is paying for the expenses involved in preparing and mailing this proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are paying the expenses involved in preparing, assembling and mailing these proxy materials and all costs of soliciting proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers and other employees may solicit proxies, without additional compensation, personally and by telephone and other means of communication.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we have
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MASCO 2017 PART VI  GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: retained Morrow Sodali LLC West Avenue, Stamford, Connecticut 06902, to assist in the solicitation of proxies for a fee of $12,000, plus expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have questions about voting your shares, you may call Morrow Sodali LLC, at (877) 787-9239 (for individual stockholders) or (203) 658-9400 (for banks and brokerage firms).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will reimburse brokers and other persons holding our common stock in their names or in the names of their nominees for their reasonable expenses in forwarding proxy materials to beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if additional matters are presented at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than the items of business described in this proxy statement, we are not aware of any other business to be acted upon at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you grant a proxy, the persons named as proxy holders, Messrs. Allman and Cole, will have the discretion to vote your shares on any additional matters properly presented for a vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If for any reason any of our director nominees is not available as a candidate, Messrs. Allman and Cole may vote your shares for another candidate (or candidates) who may be nominated by the Board, or the Board may reduce its size.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding and how does it affect me?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy rules of the SEC permit companies and intermediaries, such as brokers and banks, to satisfy proxy statement delivery requirements for two or more stockholders sharing an address by delivering one proxy statement to those stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure, known as householding, reduces the amount of duplicate information that stockholders receive and lowers our printing and mailing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have been notified that certain intermediaries will use householding for our proxy materials and our 2016 Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, only one proxy statement and 2016 Annual Report may have been delivered to your address if multiple stockholders share that address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who wish to opt out of this procedure and receive separate copies of the proxy statement and annual report in the future, or stockholders who are receiving multiple copies and would like to receive only one copy, should contact their bank, broker or other nominee or us at the address and telephone number below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will promptly send a separate copy of the proxy statement for the Annual Meeting or 2016 Annual Report if you send your request to webmaster@mascohq.com, call our Investor Relations Department at (313) 274-7400, or if you write to Investor Relations, Masco Corporation, 21001 Van Born Road, Taylor, Michigan 48180.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Website
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain a website at www.masco.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information on our website is not a part of this proxy statement, and it is not incorporated into any other filings we make with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to submit a proposal to be considered at the 2018 Annual Meeting, you must comply with the following procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any communication to be made to our Secretary as described below should be sent to: Kenneth G. Cole, Secretary, Masco Corporation, 21001 Van Born Road, Taylor, MI 48180.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are relocating our corporate offices, and beginning on July 1, 2017, please send communications to P.O. Box 510987, Livonia, MI 48151.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT PROPOSAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you intend to present proposals to be included in our proxy statement for our 2018 Annual Meeting, you must give written notice of your intent to our Secretary on or before December 1, 2017 (120 calendar days prior to the anniversary of our mailing this proxy statement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposals must comply with SEC regulations under Rule 14a-8 for including stockholder proposals in a companys materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MATTER FOR ANNUAL MEETING AGENDA
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you intend to bring a matter before next years meeting, other than by submitting a proposal to be included in our proxy statement, we must receive notice in accordance with our Bylaws, which state that our Secretary must receive your notice no earlier than January 12, 2018 and no later than February 11, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each matter you intend to bring before the meeting, your notice must include a brief description of the business to be brought before the meeting; the text of the proposal or business (including the text of any resolutions proposed for consideration and, if such business includes a proposal to amend the Bylaws, the language of the proposed amendment); the reasons for conducting the business at the meeting and any material interest you may have in such business; your name and address as it appears in our records; the number of shares of our common stock you own; a representation that you are a holder of record of shares of our stock entitled to vote at such meeting and you intend to appear in person or by proxy at the meeting to propose such business; and a representation as to whether you are part of a group that intends to deliver a proxy statement or form of proxy to holders of at least the percentage of our outstanding common stock required to approve or adopt such proposal, or if you intend to otherwise solicit proxies from stockholders in support of your proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR CANDIDATE NOMINATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to nominate director candidates for election to the Board at the 2018 Annual Meeting, you must submit the following information required by our Certificate of Incorporation to our Secretary no earlier than January 12, 2018 and no later than February 11, 2018: your name and address and the name and address of the person(s) to be nominated; a representation that you are a holder of record of shares of our common stock entitled to vote at such meeting and you intend to appear in person or by proxy at the meeting to nominate the person(s) specified in the notice; a description of all arrangements or understandings between you and each nominee and any other person(s) (naming such person(s)) pursuant to which the nomination(s) is or are to be made by you; other information regarding each nominee you are proposing, as would have been required to be included in a proxy statement filed pursuant to the SECs proxy rules if the nominee had been nominated by the Board of Directors; and the written consent of each nominee to serve as our director if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Bylaws require that the notice of intent to make a nomination shall be accompanied by a statement whether each nominee, if elected, intends to tender, promptly following such election, an irrevocable resignation effective upon such persons failure to receive the required vote for re-election at the next meeting at which such person would face re-election and upon the Board of Directors acceptance of such resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws also state that a stockholder seeking to make a nomination before an annual meeting shall promptly provide to us any other information we reasonably request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
